uientry.s:
local this = UIComponent(Address)
function RemoveItem() UIComponent( this:Parent() ):LuaCall( "RemoveDiplomacyItem" ) end

local this = UIComponent(Address)
region = nil
function Initialise( r ) region = r end
function OnMouseOn() local tooltip = UIComponent( Component.Root() ):LuaCall( "SetTooltipMethod", "dipl_region" ) if tooltip ~= nil then UIComponent(tooltip):LuaCall( "Initialise", region ) end end
function OnMouseOff() UIComponent( Component.Root() ):LuaCall( "SetTooltipMethod", "standard" ) end
function ShowRegion() UIComponent( this:Parent() ):LuaCall( "ShowRegion", region ) end

local this = UIComponent(Address)
function ShowRegion() UIComponent( this:Parent() ):LuaCall( "ShowRegion" ) end
